results.name: Reversed Zeckendorf binary representation of natural numbers.
comment: A000201 = row numbers starting with an even number of zeros;
for n > 0: A035614(n-1) = number of leading zeros of n-th row.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..1000 of triangle, flattened
xref: Cf. A072649 (row lengths, n>0), A007895 (row sums).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 10 2013
